title: What are your best League of Legends pickup lines??
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5lx_UCcK7Yo

So, Love and League got me thinking… How would you go about picking up your ultimate League of Legends bae? Perhaps with a suave one liner? With a support playin’ wingman at your back?

If you were trying to frolic with Fiddlesticks (come on, he’s kinda cute...in a horrifying way) or rendezvous with Riven, what would you say??

[Just remember, don’t break any of the board rules with your pickup lines! Clever > Dirty!]

replies.body:
Are you a minion because I can cs together...
_sorry_
THIS IS AMAZING

I find the line to be less important than the bait used.

{{champion:267}}
Do you ever get that feeling Phreak owns 20 accounts and haunts the boards with them?

> [{quoted}](name=Valkyrie Witch,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=I4by3bkb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-15T20:36:46.261+0000)
>
> I find the line to be less important than the bait used.
> 
> {{champion:267}}

I want you to be my {{champion:429}} and will happily be your soul bound!
{{champion:421}} *Random Noises*
"Okay" - {{champion:33}}
Are you Thresh? Because you got me hooked. And now I'm stuck in your lantern oh dear god help
poor sena, she couldn't resist
{{champion:432}} Erotic didgeridoo noises
{{champion:432}} \*careless whisper*
{{champion:119}}  The name's Draven
Hey soraka, is that a banana in your pocket or..? Oh i guess it is just a banana, nvm.
No one expects the banana {{champion:16}}
Top or bottom?
So simple. So beautiful.
Until the answer is jungle.
It's more interesting when the answer is mid... if you're into that kind of thing.

{{champion:31}} : "Greetings fair lady, would you care to join me for a spot of tea by the river? It's quite nice this time of match, just be sure to leave before Baron arrives, he's such a rude one, perhaps before he arrives you could join me in my abode for desert afterwards?"
Want to know why me Roger is so Jolly?  {{champion:41}}
{{champion:74}} Raise your WHAT?
Armed and ready! {{champion:17}}
Mom always said I was big for my age ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) {{champion:154}}
Valor gouge their eyes out, no ones can be as beautiful as mine
Can't tell if this is really cute because it's Quinn or just straight up terrifying

Female:

{{champion:222}} I hope I don't Jinx this...

{{champion:21}} She said no. How Miss Fortune-ate

{{champion:15}} "If you go out with me, we will have a Sivir-ly good time"

{{champion:99}} It will take a lot of Lux to get her to go out with me...

{{champion:81}} "My love for you Ezreal"

{{champion:86}} "You're going to like going out with me. I Garen-tee it."

{{champion:112}} A lot of people are competing for his love, but I will be the Viktor!

...You're* for garen.

I'M SORRY I CAN'T HELP IT!

{{champion:75}} I will love you until the day I get 6 stacks off of you.

{{champion:150}} I'm a grower, not a shower ;)

{{champion:11}} I may be fast, but I still got sustain.

How much does a {{champion:106}} weigh? Enough to break the ice!
im going to give you something truly outrageous
{{champion:17}} "size doesn't mean everything"

ADC took red
AP Mage took blue
But if I had to the choice to carry anyone
Of course, it'd be you



I'm forever alone{{item:3070}}
Hey baby are you bronze? Because I can't seem to get away from you
{{champion:122}} wanna get split in half?
Id ward her bush.
{{champion:90}} hey baby, do you want to bow to the Void or be consumed by it?
I was on a date with Soraka, but when we got into the bedroom, I was not expecting the Banana.

{{champion:60}}

You can trap me in your web anytime.
Whenever I see you, I can hardly think straight... (Or is that just the neurotoxins?)
Girl, your cocoon isn't the only thing that's stunning.
{{champion:60}} Love a woman with long legs.

let me try.
{{champion:35}}  Really hope I'm not hallucinating cause I badly want you to be the real thing.
{{champion:222}} Hi, I've just gone crazy for you, you'll have to wait a bit for the doctor's note though.
{{champion:8}} I'm positive you're my type.
{{champion:429}} Don't worry, I'm pretty good with commitment.
{{champion:19}}  You're the first one I don't want to run. (or simply "pls don't run.")
{{champion:103}} Up for a game? Don't worry we don't have to know which one were playing yet.
{{champion:2}} Living to a ripe old age peacefully may not be so dishonorable if you did it with me.
{{champion:113}} You own what you take, so why not take me out with you?

I may not build ap, but my penetration is magical
{{champion:44}}

You must be Janna, because you've blown me away.

Ezreal would say you Don't belong in a museum!

I may not be diamond, but I can be as hard as one.

Pretend I'm Syndra and let me ult you?
{{champion:114}} I am an artist with a sword, In more ways than one ;)
I always have a {{item:3140}} for a {{champion:113}} ult. Its easy to break the ice.
{{champion:29}} I gave you my love, I'm gonna want that back.
